objects.name: InfoText
objects.string:
GDevelop Particles v. 1.0.0

This project is developed by Andriy Matviychuk (Wishforge Games) using GDevelop Engine. 

You are free to use these particle effects in your free or commercial projects and there is no need to mention Wishforge Games in any way, but it's very appreciated if you do so.

Some VFX use images generated using Photoshop Brushes from www.brusheezy.com and all the icons used in this app are downloaded from www.iconfinder.com

If you wish to leave your feedback, suggest new particles to be included in the release or simply say hi, please do so on my Twitter, Youtube or Discord.

Thank you for downloading this Free GDevelop Particles Library.

events.comment: Display FPS + Default Particles and Glow Position
